summary:
- **Fund Name**: Betashares Geared Short US Treasury Bond Currency Hedged Complex ETF (ASX: BBFD)  
- **Notional Derivatives Exposure**: -$3,138,342 (as of 30 June 2025)  
- **Notional Exposure as % of NAV**: -284.88% (within target range of -250% to -300%)  
- **Investment Strategy**: Geared short exposure to 10-year US Treasury Bonds via futures, currency-hedged to AUD.  
- **Risk Warning**: High-risk due to gearing (magnifies gains/losses); requires active monitoring.  

*No material trading or capital markets actions identified (routine exposure disclosure).*
